context.p: The control system has a discrete menu that installing contractors and/or service agents can access to enter contact information for their customers. This contact information will be displayed with all fault and alert messages.

step.cmd: From the Desktop screen, press and hold down the middle (unmarked) area located between the MENU and HELP buttons for 15 seconds to activate the Contact Information screen. See .

stepresult.p: This will launch a discrete menu where personalized contact information can be entered.

step.cmd: Using the Slidebar, select (highlighted in black) the Show Contact menu item.
Press ACCEPT to activate the adjustment mode for this parameter.
Press the + and - buttons to change the setting from No to Yes and press ACCEPT to save the new setting.

fig.title: Service Contact Information Menu - Show Contact Setting

info.note: The Access Code at the bottom of the Service Contact Information screen is for manufacturing engineering purposes only. There are no user settings or information accessed through this menu item.

step.cmd: Press Change Contact Name to enter this menu.

fig.title: Service Contact Information Menu - Show Contact Setting

step.cmd: Press the +, -, <, and > buttons, to enter your name or the name of your company.

fig.title: Service Contact Information Menu - Entering Contact Information

step.cmd: When finished, press ACCEPT to save the new Contact Name. The control system will return to the discrete menu.
Follow these instructions to change the Contact Phone Number.
When the new Contact Name and Contact Phone number have both been updated, press BACK to return to the Desktop screen.

fig.title: Service Contact Information Menu - Returning to the Home Screen
